user_query: I want to surprise my family with a homemade pizza night. Can you give me the recipe for a delicious Vodka Martini cocktail? Also, provide me with the recipe for a pizza with stuffed crust and cheese. Additionally, find a dessert recipe that complements the pizza.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a recipe for a Vodka Martini cocktail.
Retrieve a recipe for a pizza with stuffed crust and cheese.
Find a dessert recipe that complements the pizza.
